channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Straightsmouth - street sweeping, 19th November
item.description:
Rubbish and leaves need to be swept up on Straightsmouth and on the footbridge between Straightsmouth and Greenwich High Road - crossing the railway. Leaves on the pavement make it very slippy.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Straightsmouth, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waist high weeds, nettles and uncut grass, 19th November
item.description:
The grass verges at AMHERST CLOSE have not been cut for many weeks. Weeds are an eye sore and now very very high, nettles growing in big clumps by the pathway to our houses in Amherst Close.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Amherst Close, Poverest, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sainsbury’s Express shop located on Beckenham Road., 19th November
item.description:
I’m writing to raise a concern about the Sainsbury’s Express shop located on Beckenham Road. The area outside the store consistently appears untidy, with litter scattered around on a regular basis. Given that this is a food retail outlet, the lack of cleanliness raises potential health and hygiene issues that I believe warrant urgent attention. I kindly ask if you could speak with the store management or take appropriate action to ensure the area is maintained to a suitable standard. A cleaner and more presentable environment would benefit both the community and the store’s reputation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, Penge, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of leaves fallen from the woods in Amherst Close, 19th November
item.description:
The leaves need to be swept on more than one occasion, they are now wet and slippery, this has already caused an elderly disabled woman to slip on her way to a car from her house. Amherst Close is directly opposite the woods and gets a lot of leaf fall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Amherst Close, Poverest, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
